answers.answer: Did they just tell you that you have high insulin, or did they say that you are Diabetic?  What other resources have you looked into to see if it is hyperinsulinism?

You need further information / evaluation.  IF it is high insulin becuase you have insulin resistance then it can be treated with diet, exercise and a drug such as metformin.If it is high for other reasons, then it would need to be handled medically.I would expect that it would more likely be becuase of insulin resistance.Are you normal weight?  Do you have any history of diabetes?  How old are you?

question: i was just told i have high insulin...28.5  (norm range is 5-12''i  s this  a high number per the usual...should I be concerned.  Is this hyperinsuilism?
title: high insulin
